data.message: FB .. a guy contact my BF saying FB is giving away 600k$, gave a 650 area code number to call an claim money. Any help or ideas on this please?

replies.message: Hey Bobbie. This is a scam. Please do not give out personal information and report the message to us by following these simple steps: http://bit.ly/2biFwxV. -Brad
To let FB know what is going on you jerk,i did not ask you so bug of!!

Facebook de ce este blocata elena elena,sub pretext ca nu este ea ca identitate,atata timp cat a trimis in arhiva facebookului,certificat de nastere,in iulie 2015,cand a mai fost blocata sub acelasi pretext,in cazul in care nu are nici o vina,numai fiindca a iesit dintr-un grup..vrei sa razi,grup, secret in care a fost introusa de mioara ene,si nu a vrut sa mai stea,,
Why can't we report FB scam pages ? the only answer under report scam is blocking
I wish they were giving away that much! lol
